wikipedia_page.main: James Gorman (born 1882) is an English former footballer who played as a defender. Born in Middlesbrough, he played for Liverpool  between 1906 and 1908, scoring once in 23 appearances. He also played for Hartlepool United and Leicester Fosse.

response: * James Gorman (VC) (1834–1882), English recipient of the Victoria Cross
* James Gorman (sport shooter) (1859–1929), American sport shooter
* James Gorman (politician) (1874–1950), English politician and trade unionist
* James Gorman (footballer, born in Dudley) (1882–?), English footballer (Stoke)
* James Gorman (footballer, born in Middlesbrough) (1882–1957), English footballer (Liverpool)
